ProcessTemplates.Name: Dynamics products and prices to Shopify
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template requests products and their prices from the specified Dynamics 365 instance, and either inserts or updates each product in the designated Shopify store after mapping them to a compatible format.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"DynamicsClientId":{"Value":"\"DynamicsClientId\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Identifier for Dynamics 365 client."},"DynamicsTenantId":{"Value":"\"DynamicsTenantId\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Identifier for Dynamics 365 tenant."},"DynamicsClientSecret":{"Value":"\"DynamicsClientSecret\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Secret key for Dynamics 365 client."},"DynamicsUrl":{"Value":"\"DynamicsUrl\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Dynamics 365 instance url."},"ShopifyUrl":{"Value":"\"ShopifyUrl\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Shopify store url."},"ShopifyAccessToken":{"Value":"\"ShopifyAccessToken\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Access token for Shopify."}}
